channel.title: GitHub CMake Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of CMake in GitHub

item.title: microsoft/vcpkg
item.description: C++ Library Manager for Windows, Linux, and MacOS

item.title: leetal/ios-cmake
item.description: A CMake toolchain file for iOS/iPadOS, visionOS, macOS, watchOS & tvOS C/C++/Obj-C++ development

item.title: gazebosim/gz-cmake
item.description: A set of CMake modules that are used by the C++-based Gazebo projects.

item.title: flathub/shared-modules
item.description: Common Flatpak modules that can be used as a git submodule
